amendment.description: Am amendment, considered as having been adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 274, to temporarily increase the maximum allowable annual contribution to Education Savings Accounts from $500 to $2,500. After the year 2002, the maximum allowable annual contribution would be $500.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by the Committee on Rules.
Considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 274.
